name: cricketcast
title: CricketCast
description: Check the cricket score and news through Raycast!
author: sampoder

commands.name: index
commands.title: Cricket Scores
commands.description: View all of the ongoing cricket scores

commands.name: news
commands.title: Cricket News
commands.description: View all of the ongoing cricket news

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
